comments.author: Simon Willnauer
comments.body: Attached a patch that improves the javadoc and modifies the TestFilteredSearch test to pass segment readers to getDocIdSet

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body: Looks good, I'll commit shortly -- thanks Simon!

description:
Filter Javadoc does not mention that the Reader passed to getDocIDSet(Reader) could be on a per-segment basis.
This caused confusion on the users-list -- see http://lucene.markmail.org/message/6knz2mkqbpxjz5po?q=date:200912+list:org.apache.lucene.java-user&page=1
We should improve the javadoc and also add a testcase that reflects filtering on a per-segment basis.
summary: Improve org.apache.lucene.search.Filter Documentation and Tests to reflect per segment readers
